abstract: Amateur Bryson DeChambeau remains hopeful after scoring 72 in second round of Masters golf tournament at Augusta National Golf Club; other tournament news noted.

headline.print_headline: Amateur Champion Brushes Off Bad End to Promising Day
headline.main: Amateur Champion Brushes Off a Bad End at Masters

snippet: After carding his second consecutive even-par 72, Bryson DeChambeau did not rue the shots that got away.
lead_paragraph: After carding his second consecutive even-par 72, Bryson DeChambeau did not rue the shots that got away.
